00047 
00048 DTFPParticle::DTFPParticle(Point p)
00049         : m_points(1,p)
00050 {
00051     m_outside = false;
00052     m_active  = true;
00053 }
00054 
00055 void DTFPParticle::setWeight(Real w)
00056 {
00057     assert(w >= 0);
00058     assert(w <= 1);
00059 
00060     m_weight.push_back(w);
00061 }
00062 
00063 char DTFPParticle::addToPath(Vector v, Mask::Pointer mask)
00064 {
00065     Point p = this->lastPoint()+v;
00066 
00067     char isIn = this->IsInside(p, mask);
00068 
00069     if(isIn == 0 || isIn == 2)
00070     {
00071         m_points.push_back(p);
00072         m_vectors.push_back(v);
00073         m_outside = true;
00074     }
00075     else if(isIn == 1)
00076     {
00077         m_points.push_back(p);
00078         m_vectors.push_back(v);
00079     }
00080 
00081     return isIn;
00082 }
00083 
00084 Real DTFPParticle::weight() const
00085 {
00086     return m_weight.back();
00087 }
00088 
00089 void DTFPParticle::SetLastWeight(Real w)
00090 {
00091     assert(w >= 0);
00092     assert(w <= 1);
00093 
00094     m_weight[m_weight.size()-1] = w;
00095 }
00096 
00097 Point DTFPParticle::lastPoint() const
00098 {
00099     return m_points.back();
00100 }
00101 
00102 void DTFPParticle::SetLastPoint(Point p)
00103 {
00104     m_points[m_points.size()-1] = p;
00105 }
00106 
00107 Vector DTFPParticle::lastVector() const
00108 {
00109     return m_vectors.back();
00110 }
00111 
00112 void DTFPParticle::SetLastVector(Vector v)
00113 {
00114     m_vectors[m_vectors.size()-1] = v;
00115 }

00117 Point DTFPParticle::getPoint(unsigned int i) const
00118 {
00119     assert(i>=0);
00120     assert(i<m_points.size());
00121 
00122     return m_points[i];
00123 }
00124 
00125 Vector DTFPParticle::getVector(unsigned int i) const
00126 {
00127     assert(i>=0);
00128     assert(i<m_vectors.size());
00129 
00130     return m_vectors[i];
00131 }
00132 
00133 Real DTFPParticle::getWeight(unsigned int i) const
00134 {
00135     assert(i>=0);
00136     assert(i<m_weight.size());
00137 
00138     return m_weight[i];
00139 }
00140 
00141 unsigned int DTFPParticle::length() const
00142 {
00143     assert(m_points.size() == m_vectors.size()+1);
00144     assert(m_vectors.size() == m_weight.size());
00145 
00146     return m_vectors.size();
00147 }

00149 bool DTFPParticle::isOutside()
00150 {
00151     return m_outside;
00152 }

00155 {
00156     return m_active;
00157 }

00159 void DTFPParticle::setActive(bool active)
00160 {
00161     m_active = active;
00162 }
00163 
00164 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, DTFPParticle p)
00165 {
00166     os << p.m_weight.back() << " " << p.m_points.size() << " ";
00167 
00168     std::vector<Point>::iterator it;
00169     for(it = p.m_points.begin(); it != p.m_points.end(); it++)
00170         os << (*it) << " ";
00171 
00172     os << std::endl;
00173 
00174     return os;
00175 }
00176 
00177 char DTFPParticle::IsInside(Point p, Mask::Pointer mask)
00178 {
00179     Mask::IndexType index;
00180     index[0] = std::floor(p.x() + 0.5);
00181     index[1] = std::floor(p.y() + 0.5);
00182     index[2] = std::floor(p.z() + 0.5);
00183 
00184     MaskRegion region = mask->GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00185 
00186     char isIn = 0;
00187 
00188     if(index[0] >= 0 && index[0] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(0) &&
00189        index[1] >= 0 && index[1] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(1) &&
00190        index[2] >= 0 && index[2] < (unsigned int)region.GetSize(2))
00191         isIn = mask->GetPixel(index);
00192 
00193     return isIn;
00194 }
